lead_paragraph: ARV Assisted Living Inc. said yesterday that it had agreed to acquire 13 housing communities for the elderly in California from the privately held Hillsdale Group L.P. for $88 million. Hillsdale, based in Burlingame, Calif., is a unit of Fremont Realty Capital L.L.C. ARV Assisted Living, based in Costa Mesa, Calif., operates 50 assisted living communities with 6,400 units in 10 states. For the six months ended Sept. 30, it reported revenue of $56.2 million. The acquisitions will expand its holdings in California to 5,300 units in 43 communities.
abstract: ARV Assisted Living Inc agrees to acquire 13 housing communities for elderly in California from Hillside Group LP for $88 million (S)

headline.main: ARV ASSISTED LIVING IN DEAL FOR 13 HOUSING COMMUNITIES
